string.text: Surgical Precision

You are a professional with a scalpel. When using any medical item, you are granted a portion of its radiation and HP healing as an additional boost over time.


Max Perk Level: 5

You are a professional with a scalpel. When using any medical item, you are granted 6% of its radiation and HP healing as an additional boost over time.


Max Perk Level: 5

When using any medical item, you are granted 12% of its radiation and HP healing as an additional boost over time.


Max Perk Level: 5

Max Perk Level: 5

When using any medical item, you are granted 30% of its radiation and HP healing as an additional boost over time.


Max Perk Level: 5
Calm Mind

Through meditation and continued exposure to the Zone, your mind has become stronger against its horrors. You are now more resistant to psy damage, and regenerate psy health faster. Regeneration is multiplied when near a campfire.


Max Perk Level: 5

Through meditation and continued exposure to the Zone, your mind has become stronger against its horrors. You are now 3% more resistant to psy damage, and regenerate psy health 20% faster. Regeneration is multiplied by 20% when near a campfire.


Max Perk Level: 5

Max Perk Level: 5

Max Perk Level: 5

You are now 12% more resistant to psy damage, and regenerate psy health 80% faster. Regeneration is multiplied by 80% when near a campfire.


Max Perk Level: 5

You are now 15% more resistant to psy damage, and regenerate psy health twice as fast. Regeneration is doubled when near a campfire.


Max Perk Level: 5
Repair Junkie

Keeping your gear in good condition has taught you to be more efficent with your tools. You now have a chance to not consume a repair item when repairing or cleaning any item.


Max Perk Level: 5

Lockpick Mastery

After finding a locksmithing guide, you are now more careful when picking the locks of locked containers. Locked containers are now easier to open.


Max Perk Level: 5


%c[d_red]REQUIRES ANOMALY LOOTBOXES MOD IN ORDER TO HAVE ANY EFFECT!!!

Mag Loader
Loading ammo is a pain. So, you decided to just get better at it. You now load ammo into weapon magazines much faster.
